course.title: MAT 4348 Graph Theory (3 units)
course.desc: Paths and cycles, trees, connectivity, Euler tours and Hamilton cycles, edge colouring, independent sets and cliques, vertex colouring, planar graphs, directed graphs.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: (MAT 2348 or MAT 3348), (MAT 2141 or MAT 2143).
